titles.title: Negative Credit Notification Act
To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to require consumer reporting agencies to notify consumers when negative information is added to the consumer's file at such agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: 4/10/2003--Introduced. Negative Credit Notification Act - Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to require a consumer reporting agency to notify the consumer that it is including information in the consumer's file that is, or may be construed as being, adverse to the consumer's interests, together with a brief description sufficient to allow the consumer to determine the accuracy, completeness, and source of such information.
